name: S. Patel
text: Matt captured our newborn session beautifully—every photo feels like a keepsake.

name: A. Chen
text: Professional, punctual, and creative. Our family photos are stunning.

name: L. Baran
text: Highly recommended! It was an amazing experience with Matt. He did it smoothly and professionally. I was worried because my 1 month baby was not in the mood, but Matt handled it so well. And the photos turned out so great! We are very satisfied. ❤️

name: I. Ogbaider
text: Matt Photography is very reliable and patient when working with kids. Gives nice photos and customer service is impressive. I have used their services four times since 2021 till date and will gladly return to do business with them and recommend them to friends.

name: E. Morozova
text:
It’s all about pleasant surprises!
First I was surprised when I got the call from the studio about promo! To tell the truth it was a little suspiciously (I’m not used to get presents like this!).
Then I was surprised even more, when Matt came! With all the requisite, lights, equipment… just in time! With all instructions! Explained me everything, won over me and the main model of the shoot - two-month-old V. Michelle:)).
We did a great job together! Despite the fact that the model's patience ran out very quickly))), we managed to take many wonderful pictures! Appreciate to Matt, my recommendation.
